name: PANKH

address: Block No.-29 House No.-413 Trilok Puri

briefDescription: PANKH is a nationalized, non government organisation registered as a society under registration society act XXI 1860. The organization is formed by the diversified people who have been expertise in different sectors (livelihood, education, health, research & development, environment friendly technology etc) and willing to contribute for the development of the underprivileged society. Thus, the PANKH engaged as a voluntary organisation since April 2013 and spread support among different age group, gender, categories of people in different states of India. Key Focus Areas:Monitoring & Evaluation Baseline & Need Assessment SurveyHealth awareness & health campsEducation Agriculture & Allied activities

address: Block No.-29 House No.-413 Trilok Puri
